instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165  (digital audio distortion)
threads.message: I have a 820-00165 that has digital audio distortion.    The sound starts out ok then becomes digitally staticly garbled and fades out with some click click then will come back.   Any ideas?

threads.title: 820-00165  (digital audio distortion)
threads.message:
Try first known good LIO board and flex.
Audio codec is placed on LIO board.

Both speakers sound bad?
Try one at a time.
Check stable power at U6410.

threads.title: 820-00165  (digital audio distortion)
threads.message:
Both speakers.  Is digital sounding failure distortion  speakers are good.
voltage stable at U6410
Have replaced the DC-IN and ribbon (no change)

threads.title: 820-00165  (digital audio distortion)
threads.message:
Then could PCH related issue.
Inspect first LIO connector from MLB.
Also check if R1310-13 have correct values.
